title: Tingle Creek
whats_it_like: Beautiful clear turquoise waters, south of the Stave Valley.  The secluded Tingle Valley runs between Mount Robbie Reid, and the Justice Group (Judge Howay & The Defendant).
scouting_portaging: Mostly boat scout-able, but quite a bit a wood.

time.original: 4 hours, but there are considerable logistics in accessing and leaving the river.
